athishaya rasawath katha puwath atham wita liyawi aththe siragewal wala anduru biththi athara siragatha wi sitina awastha wala bawa apa asa atha.emenma bohomayak sarthaka minisun bihiwi aththeda, dawanthayan nirmanaya wi aththeda athishaya duk kamkatolu mathin bawa norahasak.ebawin jiwithaya yanu obata kisiweku wisin dinadena parithyagashili aramunak nowana bawanam sabaya.obe jiwithaya oba wisinma diniya yuthu bawa sthiraya.bohomayak piris anekage uuna purnayan desa bala thamata athi haki de nirnaya karanuye,sarthakathwaya nam sapekshathwaya eya manina pradhana minum danda bawata path karaganimini.thamata himi wimata pera anekata himiwi athnam eyata oba duk wima pala rahithaya.oba sathuwa kisiwak nathath oba goda nagagena athi balaporoththu wala obata awashyaya siyalla sangawi atha.balaporoththu minisawa jiwath karawanawa yayi pawasanuye balaporoththu mathin ohu ohuta awasi anagatha subadayi lokaya nirmanaya karagena awasan nisaya.
